thread.title: Mahershala Ali Gives A Powerful Speech While Accepting The Oscar For Best Supporting Actor
thread.title_full: Mahershala Ali Gives A Powerful Speech While Accepting The Oscar For Best Supporting Actor

author: Alex Diedrick
title: Mahershala Ali Gives A Powerful Speech While Accepting The Oscar For Best Supporting Actor
text:
Moonlight
Mahershala Ali has had quite the year, and quite the awards season on top of that. With roles in Hidden Figures , Moonlight , and Netflix’s Luke Cage , the actor has finally broken away from the pack and garnered the notice that he has long-deserved. That all came to a head on Sunday night when he won the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor and gave a powerful speech.
